game.name: Hell Division
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Hell Division은 3인칭 슈팅 게임으로, 첨단 기술 세계에서 전투 드론을 조종하며 박진감 넘치는 공중 전투를 펼칩니다. 다양한 무기를 사용해 적을 처치하고, 미래적인 전장에서 싸우세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hell Division is a game from the 3rd person, which is a battle of combat drones.

reviewHighlights.text: Flying a drone is fun. Visual effects and dynamic combat will keep you engaged.
